name: CreateMessageDataExport
description:
Create a data export job for Intercom messages.

This tool creates a data export job for message content within specified date ranges in Intercom. Only one active export job is permitted per workspace. Dates include all data from the specified start to end dates.

parameters.name: intercom_version
parameters.description: Specify the Intercom API version to use. Accepted values are: 1.0 to 2.9.

parameters.name: date_range_unix_timestamps
parameters.description: A JSON object with 'created_at_after' and 'created_at_before' as unix timestamps to define the date range for the export.

created_at_after.description: The start date that you request data for. It must be formatted as a unix timestamp.

created_at_before.description: The end date that you request data for. It must be formatted as a unix timestamp.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Intercom API

created_at_after.description: The start date that you request data for. It must be formatted as a unix timestamp.

created_at_before.description: The end date that you request data for. It must be formatted as a unix timestamp.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
